mapper.select: SELECT alarm_id as alarmId, line_id as line, process_id as process, alarm_type as alarmType, alarm_time as alarmTime FROM unexpected_faults ORDER BY alarm_time LIMIT 10
SELECT alarm_id as alarmId, line_id as line, process_id as process, alarm_type as alarmType, alarm_time as alarmTime FROM unexpected_faults WHERE alarm_id = #{alarmId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO unexpected_faults ( alarm_id, line_id, process_id, alarm_type, alarm_time ) VALUES ( #{alarmId}, #{line}, #{process}, #{alarmType}, #{alarmTime} )
